1.title: Bobby's Basics: Steakhouse at Home
1.plot: In the Season 4 premiere, chef Bobby Flay uses simple techniques and staple ingredients to recreate an elegant steakhouse experience in his backyard. Included: easy tips for grilling a juicy rib-eye steak. Also: on the menu: crisp potatoes with a mustard garlic dressing; charred broccoli rabe with a red pepper relish; and a bubbly grape cocktail.

2.title: Bobby's Basics: Simply Skewers
2.plot: Bobby uses skewers when preparing a Mediterranean-inspired menu. Dishes include: zucchini with a jalapeño-yogurt sauce; shrimp drizzled with a Calabrian chili oil; & a classic pasta salad with a Greek spin. Also: a foolproof sangria recipe.

3.title: Bobby's Basics: Go-To Grilling
3.plot: Bobby reveals his go-to techniques for grilling as he prepares chicken with a fresh and rustic herb sauce and an easy grapefruit dessert. Also: he makes one vinaigrette to use on both potatoes with goat cheese and asparagus crostini.

4.title: Bobby's Basics: New Grilling Classics
4.plot: A light and healthy menu features grilled halibut finished with a drizzle of citrus-brown butter vinaigrette. Also prepared: a veggie-and-bread salad tossed in an herb dressing, crunchy green beans, and blackberry-flavored shooters.

5.title: Bobby's Basics: Grilled Taco Party
5.plot: Tacos are on the menu. For fillings, Bobby prepares glazed lamb with fresh salsa, and a spice-infused Portobello topped with queso fresco. Also: a five-ingredient salad; and a pitcher of Brazilian limeade.

6.title: Bobby's Basics: Veggie Delight
6.plot: A vegetarian-style menu: Bobby re-imagines pizza using a meaty Portobello mushroom topped with melted goat cheese and a mixture of olives, capers and tomatoes; and later, he prepares a simple, flavorful dressing for a salad of fresh greens.

7.title: Bobby's Basics: Fish Taco Fiesta
7.plot: Fish tacos are on the menu. Included: Bobby mixes a customized spice rub to use on grilled mahi-mahi; and prepares an avocado relish with cilantro pesto. Also: citrus-and-red-cabbage slaw.

8.title: Bobby's Basics: Farmers' Market Feast
8.plot: Bobby grills fresh ingredients from the farmers' market. On the menu: sticky glazed chicken thighs in butter lettuce; a corn-and-scallion salad with an herb dressing; peaches topped with an arugula pesto.

9.title: Bobby's Basics: Burgers, Fries and Shakes
9.plot: Burgers are on the menu. To begin, Bobby prepares patties with beef and turkey; and creates several toppings, including horseradish mustard, chipotle ketchup, and Russian dressing slaw; grilled sweet potato fries; peach cobbler shake.

10.title: Bobby's Basics: Bold Flavor Barbecue
10.plot: Bobby creates a menu using bold flavors. Included: a spicy marinade for a juicy grilled beef tenderloin; grilled smashed potatoes w/toasted spices; a tropical-style slaw with a sweet-and-sour dressing. Also: a hibiscus-flavor agua fresca.

11.title: Bobby's Basics: Sizzling Sausages
11.plot: Sandwiches are made using grilled sausages. On the menu: beer-glazed bratwurst w/ a wilted red-cabbage slaw; an open-face New York-style sausage sandwich w/ balsamic onions and grilled tomatoes; and to drink, a tea-infused bubbly cocktail.

12.title: Bobby's Basics: Backyard Mediterranean
12.plot: Bobby grills up a taste of the Mediterranean. On the menu: juicy corn on the cob; a crunchy carrot slaw; a smooth eggplant dip; flavor-infused seafood; and to drink, rose wine with added fruit.

13.title: Bobby's Basics: Quick and Easy Southern Grilling
13.plot: Bobby prepares an authentic Southern barbecue menu, beginning with his how-to tips for BBQ sauce and spice rubs. Also: a sweet-and-sour succotash; grilled sweet potatoes with a flavorful compound butter; and a peach-flavored variation on a mint julep.

1.title: Pacific Northwest Fresh Off the Grill
1.plot: Bobby uses the crown jewels of the Pacific Northwest to create a BBQ menu. Prepared: Dungeness crabs; burgers cooked on cedar planks with grilled Walla Walla onions and mushrooms; smoked salmon.

2.title: Wine & Dine Barbecue
2.plot: A meal, inspired by California's Wine Country, includes grilled rib-eye, served w/goat cheese, Meyer lemon-honey mustard and watercress; apricot-glazed grilled-chicken salad topped w/grapes, almonds and Fresco chilies, grilled flatbread.

3.title: Greek Barbecue ... Opa!
3.plot: Bobby Flay cooks up a Mediterranean island, Greek-inspired barbecue menu, including gyros with radish Tzatziki and oregano vinaigrette; charcoal grilled shrimp and kalamaria.

4.title: Cuba on the Q
4.plot: Bobby dazzles us as he cooks some Cuban BBQ classics with a twist, including pulled-pork tacos with guava glaze; sour orange red cabbage jicama slaw; skirt steak with tomato escabecht and tomato sauce.

5.title: Don't Mess with Texas BBQ
5.plot: Texas BBQ menu includes smoked spice-rubbed brisket; Texas-style potato salad with mustard and pickled red onion; rotisserie chicken with black-pepper-mustard barbecue sauce; honey-rum baked beans; grilled corn with maple-chipotle butter.

6.title: Spanish Barbecue Fiesta
6.plot: You may need a "siesta" after Bobby is finished with this Spanish BBQ meal. Paella is made on the grill, along with spice-rubbed rack of pork with sherry-vinegar barbecue sauce and grilled peaches in wine.

7.title: Argentina on the Grill
7.plot: No need to cry for Argentina in Bobby Flay's amazing Argentinean style BBQ. On the menu: grilled skirt steak with chimichurri sauce; rocket salad with fried egg; grilled chorizo and grilled provoleta crostini; and pisco-sour sangria.

8.title: New England Barbecue Extreme
8.plot: Fresh catch is the theme of the day in this barbecue seafood extravaganza. Smoked swordfish with clam-garlic-parsley sauce; grilled lobster sandwiches; sea-scallop skewers with hot-pepper-and-garlic vinaigrette; grilled oysters fra diavolo.

9.title: California Coasting on the Grill
9.plot: Bobby pays homage to California BBQ. Prepared: barbecue tri tip with Santa Maria pinquito-bean relish; grilled artichokes w/green-goddess dressing; grilled white California peaches w/almond-mint pesto; and peach sparkling-wine cocktails.

10.title: Middle Eastern Supreme Barbecue
10.plot: You're in for a treat with this Middle Eastern Bobby Flay-style barbecue. The meal includes tuna kofte in a pomegranate-molasses-mint glaze; spicy hummus; apricot-glazed lamb chops w/pistachios and sumac; sea scallops w/cracked wheat salad.

11.title: Japanese Grillin'
11.plot: Flexing his sushi chef muscles, he whips up a Japanese BBQ feast by grilling tuna, yellow tail & salmon on a hibachi. Also prepared: miso-glazed Japanese eggplant; chicken yakitori; & Asian spice-rubbed ribs w/pineapple-ginger BBQ sauce.

12.title: Barbe-Cucina
12.plot: Bobby goes Mediterranean, as he barbecues an amazing Italian menu, including rosemary smoked chicken; wood-grilled oysters; grilled roasted pork loin with agrodolce grilled peaches and grilled pizza bianca.

13.title: Beer, Brats and Barbecue
13.plot: It looks like Oktoberfest in Bobby Flay's barbecue world. On the menu: hot smoked-trout salad with cucumbers; grilled fingerling potatoes with mustard-dill vinaigrette; beer-brined brats with fondue.

14.title: South of the Border Barbecue
14.plot: Get your margaritas going because Bobby is doing barbecue, Mexican style. On the menu: whole red snapper with salsa Veracruz; duck tacos with pickled-onion relish; slow-smoked pork tenderloin with napa-cabbage slaw and queso fresco.

15.title: Smoky and Spicy Indian Barbecue
15.plot: Bobby is in spice box heaven as he creates a Indian-inspired bbq menu, featuring grilled halibut with corn-coconut curry sauce; grilled shrimp skewers w/cilantro-mint chutney; smoked ginger chicken w/cardamon, cloves, cinnamon; naan bread.

16.title: Giving Thanks for Barbecue
16.plot: Bobby takes Thanksgiving dishes, and brings them to the outdoor grill. He makes Cajun brined turkey two different ways; grilled Idaho potatoes with crab-meat green onion dressing.

1.title: Tasty Tales from the Grillin' Southwest
1.plot: Bobby Flay's exploring the flavors that first inspired him. On the menu: grilled oysters with jalapeño-cilantro mignonette; lobster tails brushed with lemon-Fresno-chili-butter; red-chili-buttermilk brined chicken with a mango-honey glaze.

2.title: Red, White and Blue on the Cue
2.plot: Bobby grills up some luscious stateside treats. On the menu: grilled soft-shell-crab sandwiches; hot dogs with onion sauce and grilled-red-pepper relish; smoked prime rib topped with red-wine sauce; cherry slushy.

3.title: Northern Italian Al Fresco Feast
3.plot: Bobby lights up the backyard with some Northern Italian-inspired grilling. Prepared: porterhouse with balsamic rosemary steak sauce; grilled treviso with gorgonzola salad.

4.title: Tempting Taste of the Islands
4.plot: Bobby Flay brings the flavors and spices of the Caribbean to the grill. On the menu: coconut-marinated pork tenderloin; smoked jerk chicken wings; ceviche; tropical sangria.

5.title: Summer Grillin' Party
5.plot: Bobby makes it clear that BBQ is his passion with a backyard spread. Prepared: Cornell chicken; grilled white fish in a spicy Moroccan chermoula marinade; red-curry-marinated skirt-steak fajitas; strawberry-and-rhubarb margaritas.

6.title: Grilling with a Spanish Flair
6.plot: Bobby takes on the "it" cuisine of the Iberian Peninsula, preparing spice-rubbed pork butt glazed w/honey & sherry vinegar; skewered lamb w/pomegranate-and-red-wine vinaigrette & mint-almond relish; grilled corn w/grated Manchego.

7.title: Mezzogiorno, Mangia Bene!
7.plot: Southern Italian dishes are made, including butterflied chicken alla diavola; lemony fennel slaw; grilled-eggplant-caponata bruschetta with ricotta salata; grilled tuna with caramelized onions, cinnamon and mint; sgroppino cocktails.

8.title: Greek Week on the Grill
8.plot: Bobby Flay brings you the fresh and simple flavors of Greece. The menu includes grilled shrimp w/tomato & feta cheese; grilled sardines w/garlic-walnut sauce; rotisserie lamb w/pomegranate & mint; lemon-feta slaw; homemade grilled pita.

9.title: California: Fresh on the Grill!
9.plot: Bobby loves bringing the light fresh cooking of our 31st state to the grill. The menu includes smoked-salmon pizza; a salad topped w/grilled lamb sausage, goat cheese, black olives & pistachio vinaigrette; & mustard-aioli grilled potatoes.

10.title: New South: Barbecue and Beyond
10.plot: A new style of cooking is rising out of Dixie, & Bobby likes it. Prepared: smoked-trout lettuce wraps w/sliced carrots & Meyer-lemon dressing; bacon burgers w/pimento cheese; curry-rubbed smoked chicken thighs; sparkling bourbon lemonade.

11.title: Backyard Mexican Food Feast
11.plot: Bobby takes us way beyond the burrito with his tour of Mexican cuisine.

12.title: Eastern Intrigue
12.plot: Asian-inspired dishes are made w/these recipes, including pork-shoulder lettuce wraps w/homemade kimchi; spice-rubbed lamp chops; grilled bok-choy salad; orange-ginger short ribs w/green-onion-and-peanut relish; coconut-iced-tea cocktails.

1.title: Backyard Barbacoa
1.plot: Bobby's take on traditional Mexican barbacoa. Recipes include smoked adobo brisket tortas; grilled red snapper with pineapple-green onion butter; a light arugula salad with jicama, papaya and a pomegranate dressing.

2.title: Four Corners 'Cue
2.plot: Bobby celebrates Southwestern-style barbecue flavors. Prepared: spice-rubbed bison short ribs; grilled fish tacos; creamed corn succotash; tequila sangria.

3.title: Delizioso Grilling
3.plot: Bobby Flay has Italy on his mind while barbecuing mouthwatering dishes. Prepared: smoked pork with fennel gremolata and grape mostarda; panzanella verde; grilled baby artichokes with mixed herbs and white wine; and espresso soda.

4.title: Farm to Flame Summer Barbecue
4.plot: Bobby Flay celebrates the bounty of summer in this farm fresh barbecue. Included: basil-rubbed halibut with puttanesca relish; salmon prepared with a maple-mustard-pepper glaze and served with a Brussel sprouts slaw; and grilled sausages topped with grilled shallot relish and ricotta. Also: layered fruit smoothies.

5.title: Northeast Barbecue Feast
5.plot: Bobby shares his go-to summer dishes, including hot lobster rolls with lemon-tarragon butter; caramelized scallops with fresh green pea vinaigrette; grilled swordfish and eggplant-grilled pepper salad; homemade raspberry ginger ale.

6.title: Spectacular Spanish Barbecue
6.plot: Bobby Flay creates a barbecue menu with Spanish flair, including seafood salad; fire-roasted baby lamb chops with smoked paprika-orange BBQ sauce; grilled Portobello salad with hazelnut pesto; and strawberry-pink grapefruit sangria.

7.title: Grills Gone Wild
7.plot: It's a trip around the world, right from the backyard. Prepared: Korean pulled pork sandwich; curried lobster roll; Tuscan tuna salad; watermelon-mint iced tea.

8.title: Moroccan Grill Magic
8.plot: Bobby Flay takes inspiration from the Moroccan bold cuisine. His menu includes lamb loin with a spicy date glaze; curry-hummus flatbread with tomato chutney; grilled chicken couscous with apricots and pistachio; and lemonade.

9.title: Southern Style Barbecue
9.plot: A Southern menu featuring ribs with a root beer-barbecue sauce; grilled shrimp with tomato-bacon-scallion vinaigrette; smoked sausage with green tomato relish; and Mississippi mud pie milkshakes.

10.title: Feast from the Middle East
10.plot: Bobby Flay's inspired by the diverse cuisine of the Middle East. Menu includes lamb shawarma; grilled fig salad; quail with pomegranate BBQ sauce; tabbouleh; apricot-mint sours.

11.title: Barbecue Block Party
11.plot: Bobby celebrates the best ingredients from Long Island with a barbecue party. On the menu are roasted duck BBQ sliders; a panzanella made with heirloom tomatoes and grilled corn; grilled fillet mignon with lavender-honey vinaigrette.

12.title: Tropical Barbecue
12.plot: Bobby Flay transports his barbecue to the islands of the Caribbean. Dishes include a rack of jerk pork; radicchio-green mango slaw; hasselbeck sweet potatoes; and a Dark and Stormy cocktail.

13.title: Fresh and Fit Grilling
13.plot: Bobby creates a delicious and guilt-free menu, including trout w/ radicchio and orange-almond vinaigrette; tuna w/ ratatouille couscous and a deconstructed pesto; a salad made w/ fresh peaches, tomatoes topped w/ a sweet Southern dressing.

imdb.plot outline: Bobby Flay is known for his barbecue so this is the perfect show for him to showcase his barbecuing skills. In this series, Flay takes outdoor grilling to the next level by showcasing his expert grilling techniques in surprising ways. The chef, surrounded by a sea of grills and his favorite grilling tools, uses flavor-packed ingredients from around the world to transform a backyard into a mecca of barbecue deliciousness.
imdb.title: Bobby Flay's Barbecue Addiction
plot: Bobby Flay is known for his barbecue so this is the perfect show for him to showcase his barbecuing skills. In this series, Flay takes outdoor grilling to the next level by showcasing his expert grilling techniques in surprising ways. The chef, surrounded by a sea of grills and his favorite grilling tools, uses flavor-packed ingredients from around the world to transform a backyard into a mecca of barbecue deliciousness.::Jwelch5742
